No comments were deleted, you can go into other server with this client. That's unusual to get no help.

I'm having the same problem as midnightisis. I can access the Breadcraft server just fine, but I can't access any other server (other than my own, although my friends can't join mine). Is there a way to fix this?

If your friends cant join yours that's something not related to the client. There are many people who connect to many servers including myself. Maybe you have old files or are trying to access a non cracked server with a cracked client.
